SVDProblemType

Determines the type of singular value problem

Synopsis

typedef enum { SVD_STANDARD=1,
               SVD_GENERALIZED    /* GSVD */
             } SVDProblemType;

See Also

SVDSetProblemType(), SVDGetProblemType()
